titleNullable: Goodreads Best Books Ever with Recommendations
descriptionNullable:
### Context
This dataset was created for data exploration and to build a recommendation system based on authors, genres, and descriptions. 

### Content 

First 10000 books from the [Best Books Ever List](https://www.goodreads.com/list/show/1.Best_Books_Ever?page=1) on Goodreads. This dataset is not much different from other Goodreads datasets here but I include a column where the **recommendations for each book** (last column) are recorded for evaluation of the recommendation system based on the data available.

The dataset will be updated with more books (up to about 55000) when the need arises to have more data.
title: Goodreads Best Books Ever with Recommendations
subtitle: Manually scraped from Goodreads
description:
### Context
This dataset was created for data exploration and to build a recommendation system based on authors, genres, and descriptions. 

### Content 

First 10000 books from the [Best Books Ever List](https://www.goodreads.com/list/show/1.Best_Books_Ever?page=1) on Goodreads. This dataset is not much different from other Goodreads datasets here but I include a column where the **recommendations for each book** (last column) are recorded for evaluation of the recommendation system based on the data available.

The dataset will be updated with more books (up to about 55000) when the need arises to have more data.
